verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
My hope is in the Lord,
from this time on
and ever more.
Oh, my hope is in the Lord
forever more.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I stand in awe within
the presence of the Lord,
in whom the wisdom of the ages lies.
For whom the raging of the sea subsides,
the living sacrifice, the only source of life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
His tender mercies come
with every rising sun.
To meet the sinner in his brokeness.
To offer healing and forgiveness.
And those who trust in him,
Will find their hearts at rest

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Mitt håp står til min Gud
fra denne dag
til evig tid
Åh, mitt håp står til min Gud
til evig tid
